languages.text: "А когда мы стояли над телом моего брата Игнильфа... ты произнес{mf||ла} верные слова. Напомнил{mf||а} мне о моем мире. И я осознал, что не готов проститься с надеждой вновь узреть его".
"When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."
languages.original_text: "А когда мы стояли над телом моего брата Игнильфа... ты произнес{mf||ла} верные слова. Напомнил{mf||а} мне о моем мире. И я осознал, что не готов проститься с надеждой вновь узреть его".

traits.locale_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."
"When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."
"When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."
"When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

languages.text: «Cuando estábamos ante el cadáver de mi hermano Ignilf... sus palabras fueron verdaderas. Me recordaron a mi hogar. Entonces supe que no estaba dispuesto a renunciar a volver a verlo».
languages.original_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando estábamos ante el cadáver de mi hermano Ignilf... sus palabras fueron verdaderas. Me recordaron a mi hogar. Entonces supe que no estaba dispuesto a renunciar a volver a verlo».

languages.text: “当我们站在我的兄弟伊格尼夫的尸体前时……你的话充满了真理。你让我想起了我的故乡。随后我意识到，我并没有放弃所有的希望，我依然想再次回去。”
languages.original_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

traits.locale_text: “当我们站在我的兄弟伊格尼夫的尸体前时……你的话充满了真理。你让我想起了我的故乡。随后我意识到，我并没有放弃所有的希望，我依然想再次回去。”

languages.text: 「イグニルフの死体のそばに立った時…あんたは真実の言葉を述べてくれた。あんたは俺に故郷を思い出させてくれたんだ。そして、もう一度故郷を見たいという希望を捨てるわけにはいかないということに気づかされたんだ」
languages.original_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

traits.locale_text: 「イグニルフの死体のそばに立った時…あんたは真実の言葉を述べてくれた。あんたは俺に故郷を思い出させてくれたんだ。そして、もう一度故郷を見たいという希望を捨てるわけにはいかないということに気づかされたんだ」

languages.text: « Quand nous contemplions le cadavre de mon frère Ignilf... vos paroles m'ont ouvert les yeux. Vous m'avez rappelé mon foyer. Et c'est alors que j'ai su que je n'étais pas prêt à renoncer à tout espoir de le revoir un jour. »
languages.original_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

traits.locale_text: « Quand nous contemplions le cadavre de mon frère Ignilf... vos paroles m'ont ouvert les yeux. Vous m'avez rappelé mon foyer. Et c'est alors que j'ai su que je n'étais pas prêt à renoncer à tout espoir de le revoir un jour. »

languages.text: "Als wir über der Leiche meines Bruders Ignilf standen ... habt Ihr wahre Worte gesprochen. Ihr habt mir meine Heimat wieder in den Verstand gerufen. Und da wusste ich, dass ich noch nicht bereit war, jede Hoffnung fahren zu lassen, sie noch einmal wiederzusehen."
languages.original_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

traits.locale_text: "Als wir über der Leiche meines Bruders Ignilf standen ... habt Ihr wahre Worte gesprochen. Ihr habt mir meine Heimat wieder in den Verstand gerufen. Und da wusste ich, dass ich noch nicht bereit war, jede Hoffnung fahren zu lassen, sie noch einmal wiederzusehen."

languages.original_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

languages.text: "Kardeşim İgnilf'in cesedinin önünde dikildiğimizde... Doğruları söylemiştin. Yuvamı tekrar aklıma getirmiştin. İşte o zaman, ait olduğum yeri yeniden görme umudumu kaybetmeye hazır olmadığımı anladım."
languages.original_text: "When we stood over the body of my brother Ignilf... you spoke true words. You brought my home back to my mind. And then I knew that I was not ready to abandon all hope of seeing it once more."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşim Ignilf'in cesedinin önünde dikildiğimizde... Doğruları söylemiştin. Yuvamı tekrar aklıma getirmiştin. O zaman ait olduğum yeri yeniden görme umudumu kaybetmeye hazır olmadığımı anlamıştım."
